description:
Light, packable insulated shirt for active winter outings. Made from pliant fabric in recycled
polyamide and perfect as a mid-layer on cold winter outings, or as a light jacket on warm days. The
ultra-light synthetic padding (55% recycled fibres) provides welcome warmth without unnecessary
bulk or weight. Press buttons at the front and a buttoned strap lets you secure the collar around your
neck to protect against cold winds.
name: Fjallraven Expedition X-Latt Shirt - Mens
